001package gbw.melange.common.navigation;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.elementary.space.ISpace;
004
005import java.util.List;
006
007
008/**
009 * <p>ISpaceNavigator interface.</p>
010 *
011 * @author GustavBW
012 * @version $Id: $Id
013 */
014public interface ISpaceNavigator {
015
016    /**
017     * <p>goToSpace.</p>
018     *
019     * @param space a {@link gbw.melange.common.elementary.space.ISpace} object
020     */
021    void goToSpace(ISpace space);
022    /**
023     * Get all spaces in the reverse order they appear on screen.
024     * I.e. the foremost space will be the last entry.
025     *
026     * @return a {@link java.util.List} object
027     */
028    List<ISpace> getOrderedList();
029
030    List<ISpace> getVisibleSpaces();
031}
